 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בְּרַם‎</span> **adverb** with adversative force, ==only, nevertheless== (derivation uncertain: [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>M 202</sup> = <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מָא‎</span> + <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בָּר‎</span>, literally ***except what:*** [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בְּרַם‎</span> often for <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אַח‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אוּלָם‎</span>; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[Exod.9.16|Exod 9:16]]; [[Exod.21.21|Exod 21:21]], and in NT for <span class="bdbLangGreek">πλήν</span>; Christian-Palestinian Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — [[Dan.2.28|Dan 2:28]]; [[Dan.4.12|Dan 4:12]] hew down the tree etc., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּרַם ֗֗֗ שְׁבֻקוּ‎</span> ***only*** leave the stump, etc., v.[[Dan.4.20|Dan 4:20]]; [[Dan.5.17|Dan 5:17]]; [[Ezra.5.13|Ezra 5:13]].
